title: By the King. A proclamation for putting the laws against Popish recusants in due execution.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,
notes: With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
